title: Israel denied Noam Chomsky and his daughter to enter Palestine. #palestine #shorts

Aviva Chomsky shares her experience of visiting Palestine with her father Noam Chomsky. Israel denied entry to Noam who was to deliver a lecture in Birzeit University. They kept asking Noam Chomsky same questions what will you speak in the event and why Birzeit university why not Tel Aviv University. After asking same things for 5 hours finally Israel  denied entry.
